casebody.data:
BOLLINGER MACHINE SHOP AND SHIPYARDS, INC., Plaintiff-Appellee, v. EVELYN JEWEL, INC., and M/V JEWEL I, Defendant-Appellant. No. 71-2058

Summary Calendar.**

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. March 2, 1972.

Before WISDOM, GODBOLD and RONEY, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5th Cir.; see Isbell Enterprises, Inc. v. Citizens Casualty Co. of New York et al., 5th Cir. 1970, 431 F.2d 409, Part I.

 *524PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1 The judgment is modified so as to reflect the total award as One Thousand Four Hundred Eighty One Dollars and Ninety-Three Cents ($1,481.93).

. See NLRB v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 5 Cir. 1970, 430 F.2d 966.
